name: 007pixel-sort-masked
description: Pixel sorting effect applied only within the segmentation mask, with options for sorting thresholds and visual adjustments.

paramDescriptions.contrast: Adjusts the contrast of the image.
paramDescriptions.saturation: Adjusts the saturation of the image.
paramDescriptions.resolution: Resolution level for processing (lower values are faster).
paramDescriptions.noise_amount: Percentage of noise to add to the effect.
paramDescriptions.noise_scale: Scale of the noise pattern applied to the image.
paramDescriptions.sorting_direction: 0 for vertical sorting, 1 for horizontal sorting.
paramDescriptions.sorting_style: Sorts pixels by 0 = Hue, 1 = Saturation, 2 = Lightness.
